title: Happy Mothers Day and thank you to all the mothers and "serving mothers" for doing the most important work in our lives - developing people and giving unconditional love.
description: Happy Mothers Day and thank you to all the mothers and "serving mothers" for doing the most important work in our lives - developing people and giving unconditional love. Moms are great role models for showing respect, care and listening with the heart.  Sounds like great leadership skills! To all of our alumni Signature Leaders and our many advisors and advocates - enjoy this day for you!
content: Happy Mothers Day and thank you to all the mothers and "serving mothers" for doing the most important work in our lives - developing people and giving unconditional love. author: Carol Seymour
